game.name: Big City Taxi Simulator 2020
game.description:
Playing the responsibilities of a taxi driver requires lots of dedication and hard work. If you also want to experience the sufferings and pain they suffer while performing their daily jobs, trying out Big City Taxi Simulator 2020 could be a nice bet. This job is going to be very tough as the company that has recently hired will pay you for a very short amount of fuel. So you have to use the fuel wisely to get your job done.

The best part is you belong from the richest family of the city and tell the company that you would use your own vehicle to take care of this unique job. Fasten your seatbelt, put your Taxi license plate on and gear up to perform the most difficult task of your life in this one of the best HTML5 car games for boys! Use the map to pick up the passengers and do not forget to drop them on their desired destination!

Make sure to avoid unwanted mistakes and try to complete each task in the least possible time to earn good money for your job. The right top portion of the screen will show you how much time you have taken to cover a particular distance. No need to get bored if you find it a bit tricky to handle this cool 3D driving simulator. Find many other top free racing simulator games for boys on our website to add more excitement and entertainment to your life!
